title: Physical store vs online one
text: After the pandemic lockdown, a lot of stores closes theirs activities and a lot of farmers couldn't sell their vegetable. The popularity of online stores has exploded but still is hard to learn to use it.

section.title: Why an online store?
section.content: After the pandemic, a lot of online store will still be popular because of the ease of making shopping.

section.title: Why an online grocery store?
section.content: Because is a easy way for farmers to sell their goods in safe condition.
